entry.title: KKM sasar sifar kes kusta menjelang 2030
entry.summary: Kementerian Kesihatan (KKM) menyasarkan sifar kes kusta tempatan baharu menjelang 2030, kata Menterinya Datuk Seri Dr Dzulkefly Ahmad.

entry.summary: Mustapha menyeru pemimpin Perikatan Nasional (PN) untuk berhenti berperangai seperti Abu Lahab dan menjual nama Islam dan perpaduan Melayu.

entry.summary: Disebabkan kejadian itu, penduduk di kedua-dua kampung terpaksa menggunakan laluan jauh untuk ke mana-mana.

entry.title: Raja Permaisuri Agong berangkat ke Majlis Sambutan Hari Ibu Peringkat Kebangsaan

entry.title: Shortcut For Boost’s Digital Bank Appears In Its Main App
entry.summary: A new shortcut for Boost Bank, the digital bank by Axiata and RHB Bank, has appeared in the main Boost app. In addition to having a separate application for the former, this addition will provide users with immediate access to it via the service’s e-wallet platform. Tapping on the shortcut will only lead to a […] The post Shortcut For Boost’s Digital Bank Appears In Its Main App appeared first on Lowyat.NET.

entry.title: Angka kematian rakyat Palestin hampir 35,000 orang ketika Israel terus bedil Gaza
entry.summary: Sekurang-kurangnya 34,971 rakyat Palestin terbunuh dalam serangan berterusan Israel di Semenanjung Gaza sejak Oktober lepas.

entry.title: Dituduh buat konsert di gereja, ini jawapan Alif Satar...

entry.summary: Perdana Menteri Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim merakamkan ucapan tahniah kepada Pakatan Harapan dan Kerajaan Perpaduan atas kemenangan calon DAP pada Pilihan Raya Kecil Dewan Undangan Negeri KKB.

entry.summary: Afrika Selatan meminta supaya Israel "segera menarik balik dan menghentikan serangan ketenteraannya" di Rafah.

entry.title: To Damage OT Systems, Hackers Tap USBs, Old Bugs & Malware
entry.summary: USBs have something the newest, hottest attack techniques lack: the ability to bridge air gaps.

entry.title: Wireless Carriers Face $200M FCC Fine As Data Privacy Waters Roil
entry.summary: Verizon, AT&T, and T-Mobile USA are being fined for sharing location data. They plan to appeal the decision, which is the culmination of a four-year investigation into how carriers sold customer data to third parties.

entry.summary: Berikut adalah berita yang paling menjadi tumpuan sepanjang Selasa, 30 April 2024.

entry.summary: Pelakon dan pengarah, Rusdi Ramli memilih untuk tidak membuka mulut perihal rumah tangganya sehingga menjadi bahan bualan masyarakat.

entry.summary: Industri kargo udara global mencatatkan 23.1 bilion tan kargo kilometer (CTK) pada Mac, mewakili pertumbuhan 10.3 peratus dari tahun ke tahun, menurut Persatuan Pengangkutan Udara Antarabangsa (IATA).

entry.summary: Cybersecurity researchers have discovered multiple campaigns targeting Docker Hub by planting millions of malicious "imageless" containers over the past five years, once again underscoring how open-source registries could pave the way for supply chain attacks. entry.title: 'Harga purata pangsapuri baharu Malaysia cecah RM582,887 pada suku pertama'

entry.summary: The U.S. government has unveiled new security guidelines aimed at bolstering critical infrastructure against artificial intelligence (AI)-related threats. entry.title: Considerations for Operational Technology Cybersecurity
entry.summary: Operational Technology (OT) refers to the hardware and software used to change, monitor, or control the enterprise's physical devices, processes, and events. Unlike traditional Information Technology (IT) systems, OT systems directly impact the physical world. This unique characteristic of OT brings additional cybersecurity considerations not typically present in conventional IT security
